Name: The Adventures of Poppe
About the game: The Adventures of Poppe is a game where you will explore different locations and find various items that will come in handy throughout the game. They include, for example: a nut, a key, a toy hobby motor, miniature wire cutters etc. It will be your task to find out where and how to use these items. By the way, Poppe is quite tiny. He's only a couple of inches tall. So any cockroach or even a fly can pose a mortal danger to him. Features Explore locations and collect items Tailor your tactics to fight your way against enemies Get upgrades and new abilities Help out different NPCs to get their support in the future Defeat bosses using your skills
